title: Healthy Eating Tips
description: Maintain a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains. Avoid excessive salt and sugar intake.

title: Mental Wellness Hotline
description: Call 1800 123 456 for free and confidential mental health support available 24/7.

title: Physical Activity Guide
description: Engage in moderate physical activity at least 30 minutes a day. Walking and Tai Chi are highly recommended.

title: Elder Care Support
description: Visit local community centers or call 1800 CARE AGE to learn more about elder care services.

title: Medication Safety Tips
description: Always follow your doctor's instructions when taking medication. Use a pill organizer to stay on track.

title: Fall Prevention Checklist
description: Keep floors clutter-free, install grab bars in bathrooms, and wear non-slip footwear at home.

title: Sleep Hygiene for Seniors
description: Maintain a consistent sleep schedule and avoid caffeine before bedtime to improve sleep quality.

title: Hydration Reminders
description: Drink at least 6-8 glasses of water daily. Use reminder apps or a schedule if needed.

title: Cognitive Health Resources
description: Stimulate your mind with puzzles, reading, and social interaction to maintain mental sharpness.

title: Aged Care Legal Advice
description: Call 1800 LEGAL HELP for free legal advice on wills, powers of attorney, and elder rights.
